scripts.setup-global: npm i rimraf bunyan webpack pm2 -g
scripts.setup: npm run setup-global && npm run update
scripts.setup-prod: npm i --production && npm i bunyan pm2 -g && pm2 update
scripts.restart: set NODE_ENV=production&& npm run rebuild-prod && npm start
scripts.restart-dev: set NODE_ENV=production&& npm run rebuild-dev && npm start
scripts.restart-hot: set NODE_ENV=hot&& npm run rebuild-hot && npm start
scripts.restart-osx: npm run clean-build && npm run build-app && npm run build-lib-prod-osx && npm start
scripts.clean: npm run clean-configure && npm run clean-build
scripts.clean-configure: rimraf config-client.js && rimraf config.client.js && rimraf config-server.js && rimraf config.server.js && rimraf index.js
scripts.build-configure: babel src/config-client.js -o config-client.js && babel src/config.client.js -o config.client.js && babel src/config-server.js -o config-server.js && babel src/config.server.js -o config.server.js && babel src/index.js -o index.js
scripts.clean-build: rimraf lib && rimraf webpack && rimraf npm-shrinkwrap.json
scripts.prebuild-public: rimraf public && rimraf etc && npm run build-webpack
scripts.build-public: ncp src/public public && ncp src/etc etc && webpack --config webpack.static.config.js --progress --profile --colors
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-app && npm run build-lib-prod && npm run build-bin
scripts.build-dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& npm run build-app && npm run build-lib-dev && npm run build-bin
scripts.build-hot: set NODE_ENV=hot&& npm run build-app && npm run build-lib-dev && npm run build-bin
scripts.rebuild-prod: npm run clean-build && npm run build-prod
scripts.rebuild-dev: npm run clean-build && npm run build-dev
scripts.rebuild-hot: npm run clean-build && npm run build-hot
scripts.git-save: npm run git-add && npm run git-commit
scripts._postversion: npm rm history&& npm rm react-router
scripts._prepublish: in-publish&& npm dedupe&& npm prune --production=false&& npm shrinkwrap || not-in-publish
scripts.package-debug: npm run configure-debug && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag debug
scripts.package-classic: npm run configure-classic && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag classic
scripts.package-aws-dev: npm run configure-aws-dev && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag aws-dev
scripts.package-dev: npm run configure-dev&& npm run build-app&& npm run release-patch -- --tag dev
scripts.package-dev-ie: npm run configure-dev && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag dev-ie
scripts.package-test: npm run configure-test && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag test
scripts.package-test-ie: npm run configure-test && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag test-ie
scripts.package-prod: npm run configure-prod && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag prod
scripts.package-prod-ie: npm run configure-prod && npm run build-app && npm run release-patch -- --tag prod-ie
scripts.build-packages: npm run build-configure && npm run build-lib-prod && npm run build-bin
scripts.packages-aws: npm run build-packages && npm run package-aws-dev
scripts.packages-all: npm run build-packages && npm run package-debug && npm run package-classic && npm run package-dev && npm run package-test && npm run package-prod
scripts.packages-ie: npm run build-packages && npm run package-dev-ie && npm run package-test-ie && npm run package-prod-ie
